name: Scopus BioPharma Inc.
description: Scopus BioPharma Inc. is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on developing innovative therapies for cancer and other serious diseases. Founded in 2016, Scopus is dedicated to advancing its proprietary drug candidates through rigorous scientific research and clinical trials. The company's lead product candidate, SCY-078, is an oral antifungal compound currently being evaluated for its efficacy in treating various fungal infections and has shown promise in preclinical studies. Additionally, Scopus is exploring the application of its proprietary platform technology in other therapeutic areas, including immuno-oncology and autoimmune diseases. By leveraging cutting-edge science and a robust pipeline, Scopus aims to address significant unmet medical needs and improve patient outcomes. The company is committed to collaborating with leading research institutions and industry partners to accelerate the development of its therapies, ultimately striving to bring new hope to patients battling life-threatening conditions. Scopus BioPharma’s mission is to create a transformative impact on global health through innovative biopharmaceutical solutions.
